characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a white van, driver of a motorcycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is seen moving erratically and eventually crashes into a pole. A white van and a motorcycle are also present in the scene, with the motorcycle moving towards the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while observing the erratic behavior of the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate or stop due to the potential collision ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving erratically and crashing into a pole. 2) Right: A motorcycle, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the right side of the road. 3) Left: A white van, approximately 8 meters away, maintaining its lane.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a grey pickup truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road near a construction site. A white sedan is seen moving from the left side towards the center of the road, while a grey pickup truck is stationary on the right side. The white sedan appears to be cutting into the lane of the self-driving vehicle, causing a potential collision risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision with the white sedan that is cutting into its lane from the left side. The vehicles speed decreases significantly over the last 5 seconds, maintaining a safe distance from the grey pickup truck on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road, cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Right side: A grey pickup truck, stationary, approximately 5 meters away, posing no immediate threat.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a multi-lane road with moderate traffic. The road is clear ahead, and there are no immediate obstacles or vehicles posing a threat. The vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position throughout the segment.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a multi-lane road. The road is clear with moderate traffic. characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving from the left lane to the right lane, potentially causing a cut-in. A cyclist and a pedestrian are crossing the road from the right side, posing a potential ghost probing risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching an intersection. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate due to the white sedans cut-in from the left lane and the presence of the cyclist and pedestrian crossing the road.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving from the left lane to the right lane, causing a potential cut-in. 2) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 15 meters away, crossing the road, posing a potential ghost probing risk. 3) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 20 meters away, crossing the road, posing a potential ghost probing risk.

summary: In this segment, a female cyclist wearing a black jacket and riding a bicycle suddenly appears from the right side of the frame and collides with the vehicle. The cyclist falls onto the road in front of the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is forced to stop abruptly due to the sudden appearance and collision with the cyclist. The vehicles speed decreases rapidly to avoid further harm to the cyclist.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A female cyclist, approximately 1 meter away, suddenly appears and collides with the vehicle, causing the vehicle to stop abruptly.
